# 프로그램

```{r google-sheet}
library(tidyverse)
# library(googlesheets4)
# googlesheets4::sheets_auth() # 구글 쉬트 인증 -----
library(lubridate)
library(readxl)

# program_tbl <- read_sheet("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1-QujZBMXyoUSZB6IGoEF2k33-gkoJ3XmuxcN7wjmfFk/edit?usp=sharing", skip =2)

program_tbl <- read_excel("data/Program.xlsx", skip =2)

keynote_tbl <- program_tbl %>% 
  slice(1:4) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names(ascii=FALSE) %>% 
  select(시간, 프로그램) %>% 
  mutate(시간 = glue::glue("{str_pad(hour(시간), width=2, pad= 0)} : {str_pad(minute(시간), width=2, pad= 0)}"))

session_01_tbl <- program_tbl %>% 
  slice(6:9) %>%
  set_names(c("시간", "Reproducible Research", "R Meets Python", "Deep Learning")) %>% 
  mutate(시간 = glue::glue("{str_pad(hour(시간), width=2, pad= 0)} : {str_pad(minute(시간), width=2, pad= 0)}"))

session_02_tbl <- program_tbl %>% 
  slice(12:n()) %>%
  set_names(c("시간", "Data Journalism", "Visualization", "Natural Language Processing")) %>% 
  mutate(시간 = glue::glue("{str_pad(hour(시간), width=2, pad= 0)} : {str_pad(minute(시간), width=2, pad= 0)}"))
```

## Keynotes

```{r keynote-reactable}
library(reactable)

keynote_tbl %>% 
    reactable::reactable(  
      columns = list(
         `시간`                 = colDef(minWidth =  50),
         `프로그램`             = colDef(minWidth =  450, align = "center")
  ))
```

## 오후 전반부

```{r keynote-reactable-session-A}
session_01_tbl %>% 
    reactable::reactable(  
      columns = list(
         `시간`                 = colDef(minWidth =  50),
        `Reproducible Research` = colDef(minWidth = 150),
        `R Meets Python`        = colDef(minWidth = 150),
        `Deep Learning`         = colDef(minWidth = 150)
  ))
```

## 오후 후반부

```{r keynote-reactable-session-B}
session_02_tbl %>% 
    reactable::reactable(  
      columns = list(
         `시간`                 = colDef(minWidth =  50),
        `Data Journalism` = colDef(minWidth = 150),
        `Visualization`        = colDef(minWidth = 150),
        `Natural Language Processing`         = colDef(minWidth = 150)
  ))
```
